name: Astro Botz
description:
By PixelFr0ggie & JunoStriker.

Astro Botz is an online multiplayer shooter game up to 20 players per match. 

Enter the Photon Network and battle against other Astro Botz in an all-out war for the prized Discordian Crown!

This game is made in conjunction with SEA Game Jam 2021.
